content.raw:
Ah, excellent. It also makes sense that you moved the code counting the compilation as successful to happen only if the file renaming worked - otherwise compilation wasn't really successful!

Thanks for having a go at a lot of these ['papercut'](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paper_cut_bug) style bugs. Fixing them makes the experience much nicer!
content.html:
Ah, excellent. It also makes sense that you moved the code counting the compilation as successful to happen only if the file renaming worked - otherwise compilation wasn't really successful!

Thanks for having a go at a lot of these 'papercut' style bugs. Fixing them makes the experience much nicer!
